Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	We are seeking a creative, strategic, and detail-oriented Digital Content Marketing Manager to lead our content marketing efforts.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for end-to-end planning, creating, and distributing valuable, relevant, and consistent content to attract and retain a clearly defined audience and ultimately drive profitable customer action.


Key Responsibilities
Content Strategy &amp; Planning:


	Develop and execute a comprehensive content strategy aligned with the company&rsquo;s brand, audience, and marketing goals.
	Conduct content audits and gap analyses to identify opportunities for new content and optimisation.
	Define content KPIs and report on performance metrics regularly.


Content Creation &amp; Management:


	Manage the end-to-end content creation process, including ideation, writing, editing, design coordination, and publishing.

	Collaborate with writers, designers, and video producers (internal or external) to maintain a consistent tone and quality.

	Stay updated on keyword trends and adjust content plans accordingly.

	Manage content calendars to ensure timely delivery and alignment with campaigns and product launches.
	Coordinate cross-functionally with product, sales, and design teams to gather insights and content needs.

Digital Content Marketing Manager Job at Ravenpay Limited




        
    

        
        Ravenpay Limited is a leading fintech company that provides financial services to individuals and organizations across Africa. Our mission is to builda financial ecosystem where every African has access to fast and reliable personalised financial tools.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Content Marketing Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a creative, strategic, and detail-oriented Digital Content Marketing Manager to lead our content marketing efforts.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for end-to-end planning, creating, and distributing valuable, relevant, and consistent content to attract and retain a clearly defined audience and ultimately drive profitable customer action.


Key Responsibilities
Content Strategy & Planning:


	Develop and execute a comprehensive content strategy aligned with the company’s brand, audience, and marketing goals.
	Conduct content audits and gap analyses to identify opportunities for new content and optimisation.
	Define content KPIs and report on performance metrics regularly.


Content Creation & Management:


	Manage the end-to-end content creation process, including ideation, writing, editing, design coordination, and publishing.
	Createand overseethe production of blogs, newsletters, social media posts, website content, case studies, video scripts, white papers, and other marketing collateral.
	Collaborate with writers, designers, and video producers (internal or external) to maintain a consistent tone and quality.


SEO & Content Optimisation:


	Optimise all content for SEO and readability; collaborate with SEO specialists to increase search visibility.
	Stay updated on keyword trends and adjust content plans accordingly.


Team & Workflow Management:


	Manage content calendars to ensure timely delivery and alignment with campaigns and product launches.
	Coordinate cross-functionally with product, sales, and design teams to gather insights and content needs.
	Supervise freelance writers, editors, or junior content creators, as needed.


Audience & Market Insights:


	Understand the target audience’s needs, behaviours, and preferences through research and data analysis.
	Stay current on industry trends and competitor content strategies to maintain content relevance and differentiation.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Organic traffic growth
	Content engagement rates (time on page, bounce rate, shares)
	Lead generation and conversion rates from content
	SEO ranking improvements
	Content production and publishing timelines met


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
	3 - 5 years of proven experience in content marketing or editorial roles.
	Excellent writing, editing, and storytelling skills.
	Strong project management and organisational skills.
	Working knowledge of SEO, content analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs), and CMS platforms (e.g., WordPress, Webflow).

Method of Application

title: Job Openings at Basscomm Nigeria Limited
content:
Basscomm Group Limited is a Mechanical and Electrical Contractor working throughout Nigeria with a reputation for completing projects efficiently, within time and budget constraints and to the highest quality it has made us the Contractor of choice for our industry over the past decade. We currently operate across Nigeria in various sectors throughout the industry.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Business Development (BD) Electrical Engineer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven business developer with solid experience in ELV (Extra-Low Voltage) Systems and Solar solutions to join our dynamic team.
	The ideal candidate will combine technical expertise with strong communication and sales skills to drive business growth, build client relationships, and provide tailored solutions that meet our customer needs.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and pursue new business opportunities in ELV systems, Solar Solutions and conduct market research.
	Assist in maintenance activities and technical site visits as required.
	Understand client requirements and design cost-effective ELV/Solar solutions that align with project specifications.
	Meet sales target and support overall business development strategies.
	Build and maintain long-term and strong relationships with new and existing clients.
	Prepare proposals and support project execution, including installation and commissioning, ensuring customer satisfaction.
	Explore and develop business circles within the region to expand market reach.
	Maintain accurate records of client’s interactions and submit weekly reports.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Electrical/Electronic Engineering, or related field.
	Minimum of 3 years of proven experience in business development, market research, sales in technical role within Electrical Engineering.
	Strong knowledge of ELV and Solar Systems (CCTV, Fire Alarm, Access Control, BMS, Intrusion Alarm, etc.).
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office, AutoCAD, and other design/sales tools is an added advantage.


Application Closing Date: 20th November, 2025.

Click here to apply online

 

 

2.) Company Driver

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking for a skilled and reliable driver to support our operations by ensuring the safe and timely transportation of personnel, equipment and material to various project site.
	The ideal candidate must have a strong understanding of road safety regulations and a commitment to maintaining our vehicle in excellent condition, ensuring efficient and smooth transportation operations.


Key responsibilities


	Safely transport employees, equipment and materials to and from job sites base on schedule and request.
	Maintain and inspect company vehicle for mechanical issues and perform basic maintenance
	Adhere to traffic laws and company safety policies
	Keep accurate record of vehicle maintenance, mileage and fuel usage,
	Communicate effectively with the logistics teams and project managers
	Provide exceptional customer service to internal and external stakeholders.


Requirements


	Strong knowledge of road safety regulations and vehicle maintenance.
	3-5 years of proven experience as a professional driver, preferably in a corporate environment.
	Valid driver’s license, a clean driving record and a good understanding of Lagos road network
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Punctual reliable and able to work independently
	Respectful and maintain confidentiality.


Application Closing Date: 31st October, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@basscommgroup.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Company Secretary

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for a highly competent, motivated, and results-driven Company Secretary / Legal Adviser to join our leadership team.
	This role combines corporate governance, legal advisory, and regulatory compliance in a dynamic working environment.


Key Responsibilities


	Support the board in ensuring the effective functioning of the board and its committees.
	Maintain the company's statutory books, including registers of members and directors
	Prepare agendas and papers for board meetings, committees, and annual general meetings (AGMs).
	Take accurate minutes, ensuring decisions are recorded and communicated.
	Manage the logistics of board and committee meetings.
	Keep up-to-date with any regulatory or statutory changes and policies that might affect the organization.
	Act as a point of communication between the board of directors and company stakeholders.
	Maintain all company records, including minutes, resolutions, and correspondence.


Key Requirement


	Bachelor's Degree in Law, Business Administration, or related field.
	Extensive knowledge of corporate, legal, and regulatory requirements.
	Proven experience in a similar role within a corporate environment
	Strong organizational and administrative skills.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Attention to detail and a high level of accuracy.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and other relevant software.
